node.display_long_description:
Is there anything more epic than slaying hordes of orcs and dragons with a bow in Virtual Reality? When nothing comes to your mind, then you probably should try this. If you thought: "Of course, slaying them with my friends online in co-op mode!", then this is the matter of destiny.

BECOME AN ELVEN ASSASSIN.
Take a bow and kill hundreds of enemies that want to get into the elven town and destroy it. As an elven assassin, you will make spectacular shots like long distance headshots.

PIECE OF CAKE THEN?
Not really. The Orcs are running fast, they break into houses to hide from your arrows, and when they got furious their massive axe is thrown to splash your head into pieces. 

ASSASSIN UNITED.
Up to four assassins may unite to defend the town. Communicate using voice chat, but watch your language. 

Disclaimer: 
Any similarity to any other fantasy movie, game or book is purely coincidental.

nodes.title: Update with new maps is now available to download!
nodes.body_text:
Hello Elves!
The new update is now available, and in it we have something really big for you.
Get your bows ready, because there will be many things to shoot at.

Winter PvP map (up to 8 players)
Welcome the new winter PvP map up to 8 players! Now you can bring even more friends together and fight each other to the death! Be careful, because the map is really big, so you can get hit from many different places!


Defend bay!
In addition to the new PvP map, starting today you will also have to defend the bay, as the Orcs have decided to come from the other side of the ocean. Get ready to sink ships and fend off the waves of enemies! 


New orcs!
Since the Orcs have travelled such a long distance, they have also decided to recruit new units. Look out for three new types of orcs. Each of them is just as dangerous as the previous ones. However, do not underestimate them, because there's strength in numbers!


We hope you enjoy the new update. 
Feel free to join our Facebook group and give us your feedback. https://www.facebook.com/groups/elvenassassin

nodes.title: Quest 2 Remastered and community update went live!
nodes.body_text:
Hello archers!
We've released a new update, and with it a lot of changes.

To start with, we have improved the graphics on the Oculus Quest 2. Each map has received a visual upgrade and looks much better. Now owners of this headset will be able to enjoy better visuals! 
Here is a few examples:




In addition to updating the graphics for Quest 2, we've added a few new features for everyone to enjoy.

Snap turn
The first feature is "Snap turn", which is the ability to rotate on the platform using the controller stick. You can enable this feature in the settings, as it is disabled by default.

Mute players
Another feature is the ability to mute other players in the game. You can do this by clicking the microphone on the scoreboard. But remember, just because you can't hear him, it doesn't mean that he can't hear you ;).

Roaring dragon
Another change is the roaring dragon. When a dragon wave comes, the dragon will make a powerful roar to let you know that he is coming. Now you will be better prepared for his arrival.

Discord Server
The last change is the icon of our Discord server in the settings. If you want to join the server and chat with others, this is the best way to do it.

A note to the previous update:
Recently you have been asking a lot about the "Password cooldown feature" because we haven't fully explained what it is. "Password cooldown" is a new feature to prevent unwanted players from joining the game. Previously, you could guess the password to a private lobby over and over until you succeeded. Now with each incorrectly entered password, the user will have to wait a few seconds to enter the password again. This should discourage some players from breaking into private games.

We hope you enjoy the update. Let us know what you think. 
You can do this on our new, official Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/elvenassassin

node.reviewDescription:
One of the best co-op games I own and one of the first I purchased because of how fun it is to play with other people. 

All you do is shoot waves of enemies with a bow while standing in a spot defending a village/town/castle depending on a map you choose. Since every map has 4+ defense points you can teleport around the map depending of where the enemy forces come from. With the last update there are five maps to choose from. 

Every wave is harder than the one before and enemy types go from orcs to flying dragons and trolls. If an enemy unit goes through you lose HP points of the town. If you lose all 100% the game is over.

As you play more and more you gain levels and also earn spell points (one every level). There are spells in form of special arrows which can really help you in tougher situations. Fire arrows, icy slowing arrows, explosive shots, shields, etc.

You also gain gold which can be used to buy some gear which is only cosmetic so it doesn’t force you to.

The single player gameplay is not that great as you don’t survive that long but it’s the multiplayer aspect that makes this game fun. I play this with my friends but you can also find some open games on a server. The co-op mode allows 4 people to play together which is really fun as the waves get harder and harder. There is also a map for PvP game where you shoot each other for points.

Developers are doing a great job with keeping this game fresh and latest update brought us two huge maps with many defending positions as well as some new features like ballista. The graphics are not as great as on PC but since it runs on Oculus it’s still very nice to look at. Voice chat works fine and allows you to either use push-to-talk or voice activated “always speak” option.

There are still few things that bug me a little. It would be nice if we had an option to start the game from the wave we already defeated without the need of starting a game from wave 1 every time. What I also don’t get is why is there such a long wait between waves in later stages of the game.

Summed up it’s a really fun bow shooting game if you’re looking for some co-op fun. It might feel a bit lonely and disappointing when playing solo but it does the job. I definitely recommend!

website_page_meta.description: Take a bow and kill hordes of orcs in the epic castle defense game. You can play alone or unite with other assassins in online co-op mode. PS. Be careful to avoid massive axes thrown at you by orc warriors.
website_page_meta.title: Elven Assassin · Oculus Quest
